Iron Skull trooper:

A lesser rank trooper came in and did a militar greeti=
ng. 

"Sorr to disturb you, Sir"said the trooper"But we got a info that you=
 should check... It's about the lost ones, the maximal and predacon group t=
hat have los long time ago..."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Nic =

  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, July 13, 2005 3:51 PM
  S=
ubject: Balistica up and running


  She finally came back to her senses. S=
he was in a dark room with grey
  walls. She obviously did not recognize th=
e place. In fact she hardly
  remembered anything... except a burning mix o=
f emotions towards
  someone... Azure. Where was he now?

  As she stood up=
 in a prone position, a door slid open and a tall
  robot, with huge weapon=
s in his back, entered without saying a word.

  Balistica: You're the one =
who had me repaired? Well, I guess I-

  ???: You have three choices, Maxim=
al. (He turned to face her) You see,
  we are quite a xenophobic bunch here=
. We don't like Maximals. However,
  we are disposed to let you join us as =
you are one of the Ancients.
  Should you not wish to do this, you will hav=
e to join the Governmental
  Army. There is no other option.

  She was fla=
bbergasted. She hadn't even said a word and she was being
  stigmatized! Ju=
st what was going on?

  Balistica: Huh... Just... Just who do you represen=
t?

  ???: I am from the Iron Skulls. We believe that the Maximals are goin=
g
  to lead us astray. War is brewing, and survival means we must impose
  =
our leadership.

  Balistica: On second thought... I think I'll get into th=
e army...

  ???: As you wish... Someone will fetch you soon enough.
